ai-pli-tv-kd9:0.3_0: The chapter on those from Campā
ai-pli-tv-kd9:0.4_0: The account of the monk Kassapagotta
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.1.1_0: At one time the Buddha was staying at Campā on the banks of the Gaggarā lotus pond.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.1.2_0: At that time in the country of Kāsī there was a village called Vāsabha.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.1.3_0: The resident monk there, Kassapagotta, was dedicated to the local monastery,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.1.4_0: trying to get good monks to come, to make those who had come be at ease, and to make the local monastery grow and reach maturity.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.1.5_0: At this time a number of monks who were wandering in Kāsī arrived at Vāsabha.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.1.6_0: When Kassapagotta saw those monks coming, he prepared seats, and he set out a foot-stool, a foot-scraper, and water for washing the feet. He then went out to meet them, received their bowls and robes, and asked if they wanted water to drink. He helped them get a bath and also with rice porridge, non-staple foods, and meals.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.1.8_0: “He’s great, this resident monk, in that he helps us with all these things.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.1.9_0: Let’s settle down right here in Vāsabha.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.2.2_0: “These monks are now rid of their tiredness from traveling.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.2.3_0: And by now they know where to get alms.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.2.4_0: Moreover, it’s hard work to seek support from other families all one’s life, and people don’t like to be asked.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.2.5_0: Let me stop helping them with rice porridge, non-staple foods, and meals.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.2.8_0: “Previously this resident monk helped us get a bath and also with rice porridge, non-staple food, and meals.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.2.9_0: But he has stopped helping us with food.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.3.1_0: Soon afterwards those newly arrived monks gathered and confronted Kassapagotta about what had happened, adding,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.3.2_0: “Previously you didn’t make any effort to have someone else make them rice porridge, the meals, and the rice porridge.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.3.3_0: But you’ve stopped helping us with food.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.3.6_0: “No. I haven’t committed any offense that I should recognize.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.3.7_0: Those newly arrived monks then ejected Kassapagotta for not recognizing an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.3.9_0: “I don’t actually know whether this was an offense or not, whether I’ve committed one or not, whether I’ve been ejected or not, whether it was legitimate or not, whether it’s reversible or not, whether it’s fit to stand or not.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.3.10_0: Let me go to Campā and ask the Buddha about this.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.4.1_0: Then Kassapagotta set his lodgings in order and, taking his bowl and robe, set out for Campā.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.4.2_0: When he eventually arrived, he went to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.4.3_0: Since it is the custom for Buddhas to greet newly arrived monks, it is the newly arrived monks of the Buddhas to greet newly arrived monks.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.4.5_0: “I hope you’re keeping well, monk, I hope you’re comfortable;
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.4.6_0: I hope you’re not tired from traveling.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.4.7_0: And where have you come from?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.4.8_0: “We’re keeping well, Venerable Sir, we’re comfortable,”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.1_0: There’s a village in the country of Kāsī called Vāsabha,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.2_0: If the Buddha committed this resident monk, the resident monks have committed it,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.3_0: trying to get good monks to come, to make those who had come be at ease, and to make the local monastery grow and reach maturity.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.4_0: Then a number of monks who were wandering in Kāsī arrived at Vāsabha.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.5_0: When I saw those monks coming, I prepared seats, set out a foot-stool, a foot-scraper, and water for washing the feet. I asked them to receive their bowls and robes, and asked if I wanted water to drink.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.7_0: ‘This resident monk is great, this resident monk, in that he helps us with all these things.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.8_0: Let’s settle down right here in Vāsabha.’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.11_0: ‘These monks are now rid of their tiredness from traveling.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.12_0: And by now they know where to get alms.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.13_0: Moreover, it’s hard work to seek support from other families all one’s life, and people don’t like to be asked.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.14_0: Let me stop helping them with rice porridge, non-staple foods, and meals.’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.15_0: And so I didn’t make any effort to get food.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.17_0: ‘Previously this resident monk helped us get a bath and also with rice porridge, non-staple food, and meals.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.18_0: But he has stopped helping us with food.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.21_0: And those newly arrived monks said to me,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.22_0: ‘Formerly you didn’t make any effort to have someone else make them rice porridge, the meal, and the rice porridge.’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.23_0: But you’ve stopped helping us with food.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.26_0: ‘I haven’t committed any offense that I should recognize.’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.27_0: Those newly arrived monks then ejected me for not recognizing an offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.29_0: ‘I don’t actually know whether this was an offense or not, whether I’ve committed one or not, whether I’ve been ejected or not, whether it was legitimate or not, whether it’s reversible or not, whether it’s fit to stand or not.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.5.30_0: Let me go to Campā and ask the Buddha about this.’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.6.2_0: and so he hasn’t committed one.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.6.4_0: You have been ejected by an illegitimate legal procedure that’s reversible and unfit to stand.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.6.5_0: Go back and stay right there in the village of Vāsabha.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.6.6_0: “Yes, Sir.” He got up from his seat, bowed down, circumambulated the Buddha with his right side toward him, and set out for Vāsabha.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.1_0: Soon those newly arrived monks became anxious and remorseful:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.3_0: that we have ejected, without reason, a pure monk who hadn’t committed any offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.4_0: Well then, let’s go to Campā and confess our offense in the presence of the Buddha.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.5_0: They then put their dwellings in order, took their bowls and robes, and set out for Campā.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.6_0: When they eventually arrived, they went to the Buddha, bowed, and sat down.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.7_0: Since it is the custom for Buddhas to greet newly arrived monks, it is the newly arrived monks of the Buddhas to greet newly arrived monks.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.9_0: “I hope you’re keeping well, monks, I hope you’re comfortable.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.10_0: I hope you’re not tired from traveling.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.11_0: And where have you come from?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.12_0: “We’re keeping well, Venerable Sir, we’re comfortable,”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.13_0: and we’re not tired from traveling.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.14_0: There’s a village in the country of Kāsī called Vāsabha,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.7.15_0: and that’s where we come from.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.8.1_0: “Are you the ones who ejected the resident monk?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.8.6_0: “Foolish men, it’s not suitable, it’s not proper, it’s not worthy of an ascetic, it’s not allowable, it’s not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.8.7_0: How can you, without reason, eject a pure monk who had not committed any offense?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.8.8_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”...
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.8.9_0: after criticizing them, he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.8.10_0: “You should not, without reason, eject a pure monk who hasn’t committed any offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.8.11_0: If you do, you commit an offense of wrong conduct.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.9.1_0: They got up from their seat, put their upper robe over one shoulder, bowed down at the Buddha’s feet, and said,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.9.2_0: “We have made a mistake, sir. It was foolish, stupid, and unskillful of us who had committed any offense.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.9.3_0: Please accept our confession for our future restraint.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.9.4_0: “Certainly you have committed an offense. Foolishly, deludedly, and unskillfully you acted like this.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.9.5_0: But since you have recognized your mistake for what it is, and have dealt with it properly, I accept it.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:1.9.6_0: For it is growth in the training of the Noble One to recognize a mistake for what it is, deal with it properly, and commit to restraint in the future.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.1.0_0: Discussion of illegitimate legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly, etc.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.1.1_0: At that time the monks at Campā did legal procedures such as these:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.1.2_0: illegitimate procedures done by an incomplete assembly; illegitimate procedures done unanimously;
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.1.3_0: legitimate legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly, legitimate-like legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.1.5_0: one person ejecting another, one ejecting two, one ejecting three, one ejecting a sangha,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.1.6_0: two ejecting one, two ejecting two, two ejecting three, two ejecting a sangha,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.1.8_0: three ejecting two, three ejecting three, three ejecting a sangha,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.1_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Devadatta,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.2_0: “How can the monks at Campā do such kinds of legal procedures?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.3_0: procedures done by an incomplete assembly; they will now do the invitation procedures with a legitimate-like legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly; they will ejected two ejecting three, one ejecting a sangha, one ejecting a group, and one ejecting a sangha.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.4_0: They then told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned Devadatta:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.5_0: “Is it true, monks, that the monks at Campā do such kinds of procedures?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.6_0: illegitimate legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly, illegitimate legal procedures done unanimously,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.10_0: “It’s not suitable, monks, it’s not proper, it’s not worthy of an ascetic, it’s not allowable, it’s not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.11_0: How can they do such kinds of legal procedures?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.12_0: By an illegitimate legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.14_0: This won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...” ...
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.2.16_0: and after giving a teaching he addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.1_0: “Illegitimate legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly are invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.2_0: Illegitimate legal procedures done unanimously are invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.3_0: Legitimate legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly are invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.4_0: Legitimate-like legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly are invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.5_0: Legitimate-like legal procedures done unanimously are invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.6_0: One person ejecting another is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.7_0: One ejecting two is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.8_0: One ejecting three is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.9_0: One ejecting a sangha is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.10_0: Two ejecting one is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.11_0: Two ejecting two is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.12_0: Two ejecting three is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.13_0: Two ejecting a sangha is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.14_0: Three ejecting one is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.15_0: Three ejecting two is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.16_0: Three ejecting three is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.17_0: Three ejecting a sangha is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.3.18_0: A sangha ejecting a sangha is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.4.1_0: There are these four kinds of legal procedure:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.4.2_0: an illegitimate legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly, an illegitimate legal procedure done unanimously, a legitimate legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly, and a legitimate legal procedure done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.4.3_0: The illegitimate legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly is reversible and unfit to stand, because it is illegitimate and the assembly is incomplete.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.4.5_0: The illegitimate legal procedure done unanimously is reversible and unfit to stand, because it is illegitimate.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.4.7_0: The legitimate legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly is reversible and unfit to stand, because it is illegitimate and the assembly is incomplete.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.4.9_0: The legitimate legal procedure done by a unanimous assembly is irreversible and fit to stand, because it is legitimate and the assembly is unanimous.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.4.11_0: Therefore, monks, you should train yourselves like this: ‘We will do legal procedures that are legitimate and unanimous.’”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:2.4.12_0: ʻWe will do observance-day ceremonies that are legitimate and have a complete assembly.’”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.0_0: Discussion of legal procedures deficient in motion, etc.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.1_0: At that time the monks from the group of six did legal procedures such as these:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.2_0: illegitimate procedures done by an incomplete assembly; illegitimate procedures done unanimously;
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.3_0: legitimate procedures done by an incomplete assembly; legitimate-like procedures done by an incomplete assembly; legitimate-like procedures done unanimously;
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.4_0: procedures deficient in motion but complete in announcement; procedures deficient in announcement but complete in motion; procedures deficient in both motion and announcement;
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.5_0: procedures not done according to the Teaching; procedures not done according to the Monastic Law; procedures not done according to the Teacher’s instructions;
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.6_0: procedures that had been objected to, that were illegitimate, reversible, and unfit to stand.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.7_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized Devadatta,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.8_0: “How can the monks from the group of six do such kinds of legal procedures?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.9_0: an illegitimate legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.10_0: do a legitimate-like procedure done by an incomplete assembly; legitimate-like procedures done by an incomplete assembly;
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.11_0: procedures deficient in motion but complete in announcement; procedures deficient in announcement but complete in motion; procedures deficient in both motion and announcement;
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.12_0: procedures not done according to the Teaching; procedures not done according to the Monastic Law; procedures not done according to the Teacher’s instructions;
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.13_0: procedures that had been objected to, that were illegitimate, reversible, and unfit to stand.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.14_0: They then told the Buddha. Soon afterwards he had the Sangha gathered and questioned Devadatta:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.15_0: “Is it true, monks, that the monks from the group of six do such kinds of procedures?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.16_0: illegitimate legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly, illegitimate legal procedures done unanimously,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.17_0: procedures that had been objected to, that were illegitimate, reversible, and unfit to stand?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.1.20_0: after criticizing them, he gave a teaching and addressed the monks:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.1_0: “Illegitimate legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly are invalid and not to be done
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.2_0: Illegitimate legal procedures done unanimously are invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.3_0: Legitimate legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly are invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.4_0: Legitimate-like legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly are invalid and not to be done
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.5_0: Legitimate-like legal procedures done unanimously are invalid and not to be done
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.6_0: Legal procedures deficient in motion but complete in announcement are invalid and not to be done
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.7_0: Legal procedures deficient in announcement but complete in motion are invalid and not to be done
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.8_0: Legal procedures deficient in both motion and announcement are invalid and not to be done
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.9_0: Legal procedures not done according to the Teaching are invalid and not to be done
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.10_0: Legal procedures not done according to the Monastic Law are invalid and not to be done
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.11_0: Legal procedures not done according to the Teacher’s instructions are invalid and not to be done
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.2.12_0: Legal procedures that have been objected to, that are illegitimate, reversible, and unfit to stand are invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.3.1_0: “Monks, there are these six kinds of legal procedure:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.3.2_0: illegitimate legal procedures, legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly, legal procedures done unanimously, legitimate-like legal procedures done by an incomplete assembly, legitimate-like legal procedures done unanimously, legitimate legal procedures done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.3.3_0: And what is an illegitimate legal procedure?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.3.4_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if they do a procedure with one motion but no announcement, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.3.5_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if they do a procedure with two motions but no announcement, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.3.6_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if they do a procedure with one announcement but no motion, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.3.7_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if they do a procedure with two announcements but no motion, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.1_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they do a procedure with one motion but no announcement,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.2_0: it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.3_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they do a procedure with two motions but no announcement, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.4_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they do a procedure with three motions but no announcement, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.5_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they do a procedure with four motions but no announcement, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.6_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they do a procedure with one announcement but no motion, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.7_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they do a procedure with two announcements but no motion, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.8_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they do a procedure with three announcements but no motion, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.9_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they do a procedure with four announcements but no motion, it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.4.10_0: This is called an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.5.1_0: “And what is a legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.5.2_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if the monks who should be present haven’t all arrived or the consent hasn’t been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent or someone present objects to the decision, it is a legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.5.3_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if the monks who should be present have arrived but the consent hasn’t been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent or someone present objects to the decision, it is a legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.5.4_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent but someone present objects to the decision, it is a legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.5.5_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if the monks who should be present haven’t all arrived or the consent hasn’t been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent or someone present objects to the decision, it is a legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.5.6_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if the monks who should be present have arrived but the consent hasn’t been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent or someone present objects to the decision, it is a legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.5.7_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent but someone present objects to the decision, it is a legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.5.8_0: This is called a legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.6.1_0: “And what is a legal procedure done unanimously?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.6.2_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent and no-one present objects to the decision, it is a legal procedure done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.6.3_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent and no-one present objects to the decision, it is a legal procedure done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.6.4_0: This is called a legal procedure done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.7.1_0: “And what is a legitimate-like legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.7.2_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if they make the announcement first and put forward the motion afterwards, and if the monks who should be present haven’t all arrived or the consent hasn’t been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent or someone present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate-like legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.7.3_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if they make the announcement first and put forward the motion afterwards, and if the monks who should be present have arrived but the consent hasn’t been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent or someone present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate-like legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.7.4_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if they make the announcement first and put forward the motion afterwards, and if the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent but someone present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate-like legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.7.5_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they make the announcements first and put forward the motion afterwards, and if the monks who should be present haven’t all arrived or the consent hasn’t been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent or someone present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate-like legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.7.6_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they make the announcements first and put forward the motion afterwards, and if the monks who should be present have arrived but the consent hasn’t been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent or someone present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate-like legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.7.7_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they make the announcements first and put forward the motion afterwards, and if the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent but someone present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate-like legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.7.8_0: This is called a legitimate-like legal procedure done by an incomplete assembly.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.8.1_0: “And what is a legitimate-like legal procedure done unanimously?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.8.2_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if they make the announcement first and put forward the motion afterwards, and the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent and no-one present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate-like legal procedure done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.8.3_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they make the announcements first and put forward the motion afterwards, and the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent and no-one present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate-like legal procedure done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.8.4_0: This is called a legitimate-like legal procedure done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.9.1_0: “And what is a legitimate legal procedure done unanimously?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.9.2_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and one announcement, if they put forward the motion first and make the announcement afterwards, and if the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent and no-one present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate legal procedure done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.9.3_0: For a procedure that requires one motion and three announcements, if they put forward the motion first and make the announcements afterwards, and if the monks who should be present have arrived and the consent has been brought for those who are eligible to give their consent and no-one present objects to the decision, it is a legitimate legal procedure done unanimously.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:3.9.4_0: This is called a legitimate legal procedure done unanimously.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.1.0_0: Discussion of what can be done by a group of four, etc.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.1.2_0: a sangha of monks consisting of a group of four, a sangha of monks consisting of a group of five, a sangha of monks consisting of a group of ten, a sangha of monks consisting of a group of twenty, a sangha of monks consisting of a group of more than twenty.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.1.3_0: A sangha of monks consisting of a group of four—unanimous, acting legitimately—is able to do all legal procedures except three:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.1.5_0: A sangha of monks consisting of a group of five—unanimous, acting legitimately—is able to do all legal procedures except two:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.1.6_0: ordination in the central Ganges plain and rehabilitation.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.1.7_0: A sangha of monks consisting of a group of ten—unanimous, acting legitimately—is able to do all legal procedures except one:
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.1.9_0: A sangha of monks consisting of a group of twenty—unanimous, acting legitimately—is able to do all legal procedures.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.1.10_0: A sangha of monks consisting of a group of more than twenty—unanimous, acting legitimately—is able to do all legal procedures.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.1_0: “If a legal procedure that requires a group of four is done with a nun as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.2_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.3_0: If a legal procedure that requires a group of four is done with a trainee nun as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.4_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.5_0: If a legal procedure that requires a group of four is done with a novice monk as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.6_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.7_0: with a novice nun as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.8_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.9_0: with one who has renounced the training as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.10_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.11_0: with one who has committed the worst kind of offense as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.12_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.13_0: with one who has been ejected for not recognizing an offense as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.14_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.15_0: with one who has been ejected for not making amends for an offense as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.16_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.17_0: with one who has been ejected for not giving up a bad view as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.18_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.19_0: with a _paṇḍaka_ as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.20_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.21_0: with one living in the community by theft as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.22_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.23_0: with one who has previously left to join the ascetics of another religion as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.24_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.25_0: with an animal as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.26_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.27_0: with a matricide as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.28_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.29_0: with a patricide as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.30_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.31_0: with a murderer of a perfected one as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.32_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.33_0: with one who has raped a nun as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.34_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.35_0: with one who has caused a schism in the Sangha as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.36_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.37_0: with one who has caused the Buddha to bleed as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.38_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.39_0: with a hermaphrodite as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.40_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.41_0: with one belonging to a different Buddhist sect as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.42_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.43_0: with one who is within a different monastic boundary as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.44_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.45_0: with one floating in the air by supernormal power as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.46_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.47_0: or with one who is subject to the legal procedure as the fourth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.2.48_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.1_0: That which requires a group of four is finished.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.2_0: “If a legal procedure that requires a group of five is done with a nun as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.3_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.4_0: If a legal procedure that requires a group of five is done with a trainee nun as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.5_0: with a novice monk as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.6_0: with a novice nun as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.7_0: with one who has renounced the training as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.8_0: with one who has committed the worst kind of offense as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.9_0: with one who has been ejected for not recognizing an offense as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.10_0: with one who has been ejected for not making amends for an offense as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.11_0: with one who has been ejected for not giving up a bad view as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.12_0: with a _paṇḍaka_ as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.13_0: with one living in the community by theft as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.14_0: with one who has previously left to join the ascetics of another religion as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.15_0: with an animal as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.16_0: with a matricide as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.17_0: with a patricide as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.18_0: with a murderer of a perfected one as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.19_0: with one who has raped a nun as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.20_0: with one who has caused a schism in the Sangha as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.21_0: with one who has caused the Buddha to bleed as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.22_0: with a hermaphrodite as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.23_0: with one belonging to a different Buddhist sect as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.24_0: with one who is within a different monastic boundary as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.25_0: with one floating in the air by supernormal power as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.26_0: or with one who is subject to the legal procedure as the fifth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.3.27_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.4.1_0: That which requires a group of five is finished.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.4.2_0: “If a legal procedure that requires a group of ten is done with a nun as the tenth member, it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.4.3_0: If a legal procedure that requires a group of ten is done with a trainee nun as the tenth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.4.5_0: or with one who is subject to the legal procedure as the tenth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.4.6_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.1_0: That which requires a group of ten is finished.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.2_0: “If a legal procedure that requires a group of twenty is done with a nun as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.3_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.4_0: If a legal procedure that requires a group of twenty is done with a trainee nun as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.5_0: with a novice monk as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.6_0: with a novice nun as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.7_0: with one who has renounced the training as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.8_0: with one who has committed the worst kind of offense as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.9_0: with one who has been ejected for not recognizing an offense as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.10_0: with one who has been ejected for not making amends for an offense as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.11_0: with one who has been ejected for not giving up a bad view as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.12_0: with a _paṇḍaka_ as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.13_0: with one living in the community by theft as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.14_0: with one who has previously left to join the ascetics of another religion as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.15_0: with an animal as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.16_0: with a matricide as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.17_0: with a patricide as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.18_0: with a murderer of a perfected one as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.19_0: with one who has raped a nun as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.20_0: with one who has caused a schism in the Sangha as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.21_0: with one who has caused the Buddha to bleed as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.22_0: with a hermaphrodite as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.23_0: with one belonging to a different Buddhist sect as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.24_0: with one who is within a different monastic boundary as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.25_0: with one floating in the air by supernormal power as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.26_0: or with one who is subject to the legal procedure as the twentieth member,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.5.27_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.1_0: That which requires a group of twenty is finished.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.2.0_0: Discussion of the one on probation, etc.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.2.1_0: “If a group with one on probation as the fourth member gives probation, sends back to the beginning, or gives the trial period, or a group with one on probation as the twentieth member rehabilitates,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.3_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.4_0: If a group with one deserving to be sent back to the beginning as the fourth member gives probation, sends back to the beginning, or gives the trial period, or a group with one deserving to be sent back to the beginning as the twentieth member rehabilitates,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.5_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.6_0: If a group with one deserving the trial period as the fourth member gives probation, sends back to the beginning, or gives the trial period, or a group with one deserving a trial period as the twentieth member rehabilitates,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.7_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.8_0: If a group with one undertaking the trial period as the fourth member gives probation, sends back to the beginning, or gives the trial period, or a group with one undertaking a trial period as the twentieth member rehabilitates,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.9_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.10_0: If a group with one deserving rehabilitation as the fourth member gives probation, sends back to the beginning, or gives the trial period, or a group with one deserving rehabilitation as the twentieth member rehabilitates,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.6.11_0: it is invalid and not to be done.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.1_0: “In the midst of the Sangha, the objections of some are valid, not the objections of others.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.2_0: Whose objections are invalid in the midst of the Sangha?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.3_0: In the midst of the Sangha, the objection of a nun is invalid.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.4_0: In the midst of the Sangha, the objection of a trainee nun,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.7_0: of one who has renounced the training,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.8_0: of one who has committed the worst kind of offense,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.11_0: one who is overwhelmed by pain,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.12_0: of one who has been ejected for not recognizing an offense,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.13_0: of one who has been ejected for not making amends for an offense,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.14_0: of one who has been ejected for not giving up a bad view,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.16_0: of one living in the community by theft,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.17_0: of one who has previously left to join the ascetics of another religion,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.21_0: of a murderer of a perfected one,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.22_0: of one who has raped a nun,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.23_0: of one who has caused a schism in the Sangha,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.24_0: of one who has caused the Buddha to bleed,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.26_0: of one who belongs to a different Buddhist sect,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.27_0: of one who is within a different monastic boundary,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.28_0: of one floating in the air by supernormal power,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.7.29_0: or of one who is subject to the legal procedure is invalid.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.8.1_0: Whose objections are invalid in the midst of the Sangha?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.8.2_0: In the midst of the Sangha, the objection of a regular monk, who belongs to the same Buddhist sect and is staying within the same monastic boundary, even if only declared to a monk sitting next to him, is valid.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.8.3_0: In the midst of the Sangha, the objection of an offense is invalid.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.0_0: Discussion of the two kinds of sending away, etc.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.1_0: “There are two kinds of sending away.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.2_0: If the Sangha sends away those who don’t have the attributes needed for being sent away,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.3_0: the sending away of some succeeds, while the sending away of others fails.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.4_0: Who are those whose sending away succeeds?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.5_0: Those who are pure, without offenses.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.6_0: This is called admittance for those who don’t succeeds.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.7_0: Who are those whose sending away succeeds?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.8_0: Those who are ignorant, incompetent, often committing offenses, incapable of determining whether they have committed an offense, constantly and improperly socializing with householders.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.9.9_0: This is called a sending away being sent away for the Sangha.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.2_0: If the Sangha admits those who don’t have the attributes needed for being admitted, the admittance of some succeeds, while the admittance of others fails.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.3_0: Who are those whose admittance fails?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.4_0: A _paṇḍaka_ doesn’t have the attributes needed for being admitted, and if the Sangha admits him, his admittance fails.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.5_0: One living in the community by theft doesn’t have the attributes needed for being admitted, and if the Sangha admits him, his admittance fails.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.6_0: One who has previously left to join the ascetics of another religion,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.10_0: a murderer of a perfected one,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.11_0: one who has raped a nun,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.12_0: one who has caused a schism in the Sangha,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.13_0: one who has caused the Buddha to bleed,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.14_0: a hermaphrodite doesn’t have the attributes needed for being admitted, and if the Sangha admits him, his admittance fails.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.10.16_0: These are called the people who don’t resentfulness of few wishes.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.1_0: Who are those whose admittance succeeds?
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.2_0: One without a hand doesn’t have the attributes needed for being admitted, but if the Sangha admits him, his admittance succeeds.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.4_0: one without a hand and a foot,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.7_0: one without an ear and nose,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.8_0: one without a finger or a toe,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.30_0: one who is blind and mute,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.31_0: one who is blind and deaf,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.32_0: one who is mute and deaf,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.33_0: one who is blind and mute and deaf doesn’t have the attributes needed for being admitted, but if the Sangha admits him, his admittance succeeds.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.34_0: This is called admittance for the attributes needed for being admitted, and if the Sangha admits him,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.35_0: These are called the people who don’t resort to few people.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:4.11.36_0: The first section for recitation on the village of Vāsabha is finished.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.0_0: Discussion of illegitimate legal procedures, etc.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.1_0: “It may be that a monk doesn’t have any offense he needs to recognize,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.2_0: The Sangha, several monks, or a single monk accuses him, saying
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.3_0: ‘You have committed an offense. Do you recognize it?’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.5_0: ‘I haven’t committed any offense that I should recognize,’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.6_0: and the Sangha ejects him for not recognizing an offense,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.7_0: it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.8_0: It may be that a monk doesn’t have any offense he needs to make amends for,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.9_0: The Sangha, several monks, or a single monk accuses him, saying
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.10_0: ‘You have committed an offense; make amends for it.’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.12_0: ‘I haven’t committed any offense that I should make amends for,’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.13_0: and the Sangha ejects him for not making amends for an offense,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.14_0: it is an illegitimate legal procedure.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.15_0: It may be that a monk doesn’t have any bad view he needs to give up,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.16_0: The Sangha, several monks, or a single monk accuses him, saying
ai-pli-tv-kd9:5.1.19_0: ‘I haven’t committed any bad view that I should give up,’

ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.1.1_0: Soon afterwards Venerable Upāli approached the Buddha, bowed, sat down,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.1.2_0: and told him what had happened,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.1.3_0: “If, Venerable Sir, a unanimous Sangha doesn’t do a legal procedure face-to-face that should be done face-to-face, is that a legitimate procedure, a procedure in accordance with the Monastic Law?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.1.4_0: “That legal procedure, Upāli, is illegitimate, contrary to the Monastic Law.”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.1_0: “If a unanimous Sangha does a procedure without questioning that should be done with questioning,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.2_0: does a procedure without admission that should be done by admission,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.3_0: applies resolution through recollection to one deserving resolution because of past insanity,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.4_0: does a procedure of further penalty against one deserving resolution because of past insanity,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.5_0: does a procedure of condemnation against one deserving a procedure of further penalty,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.6_0: does a procedure of demotion against one deserving a procedure of condemnation,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.7_0: does a legal procedure of banishment against one deserving a procedure of demotion,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.8_0: does a procedure of reconciliation against one deserving a procedure of banishment,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.9_0: does a procedure of ejection against one deserving a procedure of reconciliation,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.10_0: gives probation to one deserving a procedure of ejection,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.12_0: gives the trial period to one deserving to be sent back to the beginning,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.2.14_0: or gives full ordination to one deserving rehabilitation, is that a legitimate procedure, a procedure in accordance with the Monastic Law?”
ai-pli-tv-kd9:6.3.1_0: “That legal procedure, Upāli, is illegitimate, contrary to the Monastic Law,

ai-pli-tv-kd9:7.6.0_0: Discussion of the legal procedure of demotion
ai-pli-tv-kd9:7.6.1_0: It may be that a monk who is ignorant, incompetent, often committing offenses, incapable of determining whether they have committed an offense, constantly and improperly socializing with householders.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:7.6.3_0: ‘This monk is ignorant, incompetent, often committing offenses, incapable of determining whether he has committed an offense, constantly and improperly socializing with householders.
ai-pli-tv-kd9:7.6.4_0: Well then, let’s do a procedure of demotion against him.’
ai-pli-tv-kd9:7.6.5_0: They do a procedure of demotion against him,
ai-pli-tv-kd9:7.6.9_0: ‘The Sangha did a legal procedure of demotion against this monk—illegitimately and with an incomplete assembly.

ai-pli-tv-kd9:7.9.4_0: Well then, let’s do a procedure of ejection against him.’
